snippet: The prestigious college in New York is known for charging its students nothing, but financial problems may have made that practice unaffordable.
abstract: Financial problems may lead the Cooper Union for the Advancement of Science and Art , prestigious art school in Manhattan's East Village, to end its policy of free tuition for students.
lead_paragraph: The prestigious college in New York is known for charging its students nothing, but financial problems may have made that practice unaffordable.

headline.seo: Cooper Union’s Tradition of Free Tuition May Be Near End
headline.main: Free Tuition at Cooper Union May Be Near End
headline.print_headline: Cooper Union’s Tradition of Free Tuition May Be Near an End

keywords.value: Cooper Union for the Advancement of Science and Art
